{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Tenda |model=W302 |revision=R |upc= |ean= |asin=B00HFR69LA;US; |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT2880 |cpu1_cspeed=266 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macrotech |fla1_model=KH29LV320DBTC-70G |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM638165TS-6G |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |serial= |jtag= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2880 |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2820 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=IC+ |sw_model=IP175C |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ch= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} '''Wireless N300 Router'''
[http://www.tendacn.com/en/product/W302R.html Product page]
The default SSID may be '''Tenda'''.
===Reviews=== *[http://www.ixbt.com/comm/tenda-w302r.shtml On '''iXBT'''] :CPU/WLAN: Ralink RT2880/RT2820 (2T2R 802.11bgn 2,4GHz) :Flash: KH29LV320DBTC (Hong Kong Macrotech Limited) 4MB :RAM: 2x Hynix HY57V641620FTP-7 (2x 8MB) 16MB :Antenna: 3x 2.5dBi fixed antennas
===Fotum threads=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=160690 On the '''OpenWrt''' forums] *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=165402 Additional OEM version of this router on the '''OpenWrt''' forums]
